journey.title: A Global Odyssey
journey.description: From the bustling streets of Tokyo to the serene landscapes of New Zealand, my journey has been one of resilience, exploration, and growth. Each chapter, marked by both triumphs and challenges, reflects my dedication to learning, adapting, and making an impact across diverse cultures and communities. This timeline showcases the pivotal moments that have shaped my life, guiding me toward a future filled with potential.

events.title: Moved to Ehime
events.description: After the earthquake, I moved to my mother's hometown in Ehime.

events.title: Went to New Zealand
events.description: I went to New Zealand and went to local junior high school in Auckland.

events.title: Went to The Philippines
events.description: I went to The Philippines and went to English School for 3 months, then went to local junior high school for a year in Cebu.

events.title: Went back to New Zealand
events.description: I went to high school in Auckland. I went to this high school for 5 years.

events.title: Injury from playing soccer
events.description:
Anterior cruciate ligament tear (ACL)
Started going to Physio.

events.title: ACL 2nd time
events.description:
After going to physio for half a year, I've almost recovered and started doing some light sports.
This resulted in a 2nd ACL.

events.title: Back to Japan for the first time in 5 years!
events.description:
I went back to Japan for the first time in 5 years! I have visited 4 companies:
- Microsoft
- HENNGE
- Cybozu
- Soulware

events.title: Got into University of Auckland
events.description:
I graduated from high school and got into University of Auckland.
I'm majoring in Computer Science and IT Management.

events.title: Knee injury the 3rd time
events.description: I injured my knee again playing futsal.
